item.dc:creator: @mr_dharok mr dharok
item.description:
@mr_dharok wrote:

[quote=“imjagexbitch, post:5, topic:190915”]nice, but how do i add them, can u post a tut plz?
do i add it to my client or server O.o[/quote]

you add it to your client, add the bit in code to class8.java, and add the model to your model folder, then log in and type add model 10312, no ::

item.title: Elite Range Armour... :]
item.dc:creator: @M_i_K_e1 M,i,K,e_
item.description:
@M_i_K_e1 wrote:

I’m not good at rotations, lol, but anyway I was browsing the models, and came up with this:

Picture:

Code:

        if(i == 8889)
        {
            class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
            class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
            class8.anInt174 = 10312;
            class8.anInt181 = 900;
            class8.anInt190 = 540;
            class8.anInt198 = 2039;
            class8.anInt199 = 0;
            class8.anInt169 = 0;
            class8.anInt194 = 0;
            class8.anInt165 = 10312;
            class8.anInt200 = 10312;
            class8.anInt164 = 10312;
            class8.anInt188 = 10312;
            class8.anInt175 = -1;
            class8.aBoolean176 = false;
            class8.aString170 = "Name";
            class8.aByteArray178 = "Examine".getBytes();

two problems, theres blank spaces, and the hair, I’m trying to work on that for ya`s…

Heres download link for the model: http://uppit.com/KHI3WF

I should have one on the attachment too.
Ignore the robes on the bottom, they’re just something I’m working on
